physical_appearance:This is a programme booklet. It is printed in blue ink against a plain piece of paper
 in landscape orientation. The title is printed at the top center of the page
 underlined. The left side of the page features a list of characters
 while the right side lists the acts and the stage crew. There is a faded signature in blue at the bottom right of the page.

sgcool_label_text:\Prisoners in the Changi P.O.W camp kept their spirits up and their minds occupied by putting on shows. The programme for a performance of Dodie Smith\u0027s Autumn Crocus [produced by Osmond Daltry with decor by Ronald Searle] \\presented at the \u0027Playhouse\u0027

metadata.title_text: Programme for a performance of Dodie Smith's Autumn Crocus
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a programme booklet. It is printed in blue ink against a plain piece of paper, in landscape orientation. The title is printed at the top center of the page, underlined. The left side of the page features a list of characters, while the right side lists the acts and the stage crew. There is a faded signature in blue at the bottom right of the page.
